EmailTemplate.name: Tour Confirmation Email French Canadian
EmailTemplate.subject: We can’t wait to meet you (Nous avons hâte de vous rencontrer)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c},
Thanks for your interest in WeWork, the platform for creators.
We're thrilled that you're thinking about becoming a member and look forward to showing you around.
You're all set for a tour at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c} on {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}! You can find us at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c}.
{!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Special_Instructions__c}.
See you soon!
The WeWork Team
joinus@wework.com {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Phone_Number__c}
